name: The Racer Project
description:
Inspired by the old 8bit racing games - The Racer Project  - is my first indie game. 

Far from what I imagined at the beginning, but still with features good enough to make me publish it. 

  • Changing tires, fix the car, vaccum, PowerUp, 10 season races, good graphics, etc.
Go Go Go !

Time to change the tires

Will you be tough enough to try the 10 different scenarios of the season ?

Feedbacks are always appreciated.

Thank you for playing.

@bySevlacnog
